description:
Failed to umount container filesystem: Unexpect
ed error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap /etc/nova/rootwrap.conf blockdev --flushbufs /dev/nbd13
Exit code: 99
Stdout: ''
Stderr: '/usr/bin/nova-rootwrap: Unauthorized command: blockdev --flushbufs /dev/nbd13 (no filter matched)\n'
title: nova rootwrap fails on blockdev

comments.content:
Failed to umount container filesystem: Unexpect
ed error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap /etc/nova/rootwrap.conf blockdev --flushbufs /dev/nbd13
Exit code: 99
Stdout: ''
Stderr: '/usr/bin/nova-rootwrap: Unauthorized command: blockdev --flushbufs /dev/nbd13 (no filter matched)\n'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dmllr

comments.content:
Hmm, are you hitting this before or after this change?  Maybe it doesn't matter, I just know it's recent and related to nbd:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/dd3f96e91581f465a52d10a212eb51b147dc38b5
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Yes, looks like that change introduced the regression
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dmllr
